This is my 2nd surf map.

Features:
+ 2 easy surf areas
+ jail
+ hurt button

It was especially made for Military Madness Surf.

Surf_hang_time_v2.bsp


sv_airaccelerate 100-150

150 = eZest

100 = hardest

In this version I cleaned up some of the bugz from the first version.

--------------------- Surf_hang_time_reloaded Reload of surf_hang_time_v2 Original by ZALOS Reload by Buck Nasty --------------------- This map is truly a classic that I did not want to see die. Thanks to ZALOS for letting me "reload" his map. Fixes: - Started all weapons constrained (can't grenade the pile of nades which cause lag @ spawn). - Fixed the bomb zone so that when the bomb explodes the game does not lag until the next round. - Added ammo to all guns. - Replaced the blinding marble tile and bright blue glass texture to something not so harsh. - Pretty much cleaned up most of all the sections. I did not smooth out the all ramps because I wanted to keep the old school feel of this map. ------------------------------------------------------------------------- ZALOS' Overview of the map:
Posted by ZALOS The goal of this map for me was to make big Surf and hopefully make it so you could kill your oppenents while surfing. I also didnt put in a buy zone so those that got to certian areas were rewarded with certian guns. The map is divided into 5 sections. 1. Spawn, it looks kinda like a "S" it is made so in a way that if you have enough speed you can make a loop and essentially run around in circles forever. I did this so you could make multiple passes at someone or chase people around. This is also a way to get to spawn. 2. Section 2 is just some surfing with a big ramp start that squeeeeezes into some smaller ramps, at the end is a teleport to the next section and guns. 3. Section 3 is a huge surf that can bring you head on into the oppenent. At the bottom is the bombsite and teleports to spawn/jail. 4. Jail- Jail has 5 entrances where you teleport in than surf to the inside, if you fall off the surf you get tped to the middle. 5. There are secrets and a pro area. :D -ZALOS-
------------------------------------------------------------------------- There are many more asthetic changes to this map which are not completely visible in the screenshots, so I suggest you download the map and try it out. Thanks again to ZALOS, all credit goes to you! ----------------------------------- Enjoy! -- Buck Nasty http://solidsurf.info/ http://www.waspnest.net/ -----------------------------------

surf_hades


A very difficult staged map. The idea of the map was to make short and simple stages that are very difficult.

Stages: 7
Tier: 6
Bonuses: 2

surf_gust created by Gobanzo Mon
(gobanzo_mon@yahoo.com)

Gust is a clean looking, moderately difficult, surf map. Most of the acton takes place on the main slopes at the beginning which gives the players their speed. The have the choice to spread off any many directions while along the main path. Platforms can be found outside the main path with weapons on them. Each platform has a teleporter to lead the player to the "top" where they can go to either spawn point.

 The teleporters at the end can dramatically boost a players speed if hit directly. They'll be teleported back to the beginning and a "gust" of wind can lift a player to the upper level slopes where a sniper platform can be found.

In my opinion, gust is better looking than most surf maps out there.

-- Credits - Authors --


-------------------------------------

First beta of my new surf map

surf_grotto is a Tier 3 Staged map with 6 Stages and 3 Bonuses.

This is a map that I made in around a week, and then took a couple more to get around to finishing. Thanks to Sam and Spy Complex for somehow convincing me to make a map at all, and then yelling at me to finish the map.

The map is inspired by old staged maps like surf_portal_game4, but ended up having a more modern feel. Everything is fairly easy, but there are tons of skips + optimizations all over the stages and bonuses to keep it interesting.

Bonus 1 is by me, Bonus 2 is by Spy Complex, and Bonus 3 is by pretzL. Thanks to both of them for making bonuses in a very quick time.

And thanks to xen for helping me solve an issue with the map + learn about something I didn't know in hammer.

Gameplay
==================
<iframe width="640" height="360" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/mvKowO3kHsM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

About The Map
------------------

This was just a short map I designed for [Tur's Surf Server](http://tursurf.com ""). I did not spend hours on it, but this is my very first Surf map (Portal 2 Designer here), so I hope people enjoy this, I know the members of Tur's server love it ;)

_I've found that you can achieve pretty high speeds on this map, so there's that._

This is my map based on the classic surf_green3 from CS 1.6, i've made this map from 0 and gave it my style.



Max 28 players
==================
Stable version
==================
Non-hurting eyes textures
==================
Lots of improvements
==================
Secrets from CS 1.6 (a little different)
==================
Fun map!
==================


Enjoy the map and if you see any kind of bug, feel free to contact me, my Steam ID is STEAM_0:0:16113354





NOTE: **YOU CANNOT DECOMPILE, MODIFY AND PORT THIS MAP, YOU CANNOT USE ANY OF MY TEXTURES.** 

------------------------------

Little history
==============

-  **Thousands of years ago, the structures from this map were found by the Aztecs and untill today no one knows why and how the structures appear.**


 

 

 

 

Map specifications
==================

- Supports 28 players
- Structures have an "aztec style"
- Textures are comfortable to the eye (They fit with the structures)
- Fun to play
- No bugs, final and stable version.



--------------------------------------------

**My nick in-game:** Lord Cheaterfield


**My steam ID:** STEAM_0:0:16113354


--------------------------------------------



Please, I would appreciate if you could rate and comment about my map so it motivates me to keep doing them for CS:S, and before rate the map, please try it in game so you can appreciate the details of the map.
====================================================================================================================

EDIT: I apologize for releasing xdream5 in its state it was in we did not test it like we should have and there were bugs that needed to be fixed. so im releasing this fix the fix includes fixing the sky box lighting which made the map shiny map is no longer shiny i also changed the water texture to a duller more recognizable texture which is not shiny either easier on the eyes. i fixed jail where it kills you when u enter sometimes not all the time did it but that should be fixed now. i fixed the right side sky water which killed you when you land on it i also added some more detail to the map which makes it more interesting. we tested this map properly this time there should not be any more bugs what so ever in this fix. Again i do apologize for the inconvenience im also releasing a fix for evo as well.

this a remix of surf_greatriver_remix2.

Welcome Greatriver fans!

Credits: All credits for original design and build go to Ace Of Spades13. (If this is incorrect, someone please inform me so I can make a change.)

The Point: I've seen surf_greatriver_v4 and it isn't a bad map, but I think it ruined the feel and integrity of the original greatriver. So, with that in mind, I decided to remake it myself.

Recommended Players: 32
Max Players: 40

Changes:

-Obviously, BIG, texture changes throughout the entire map.
-A lot of new optimization to make the map run flawlessy.
-Construction changes, some subtle, some not. (the original .vmf needed a great amount of "cleaning")
-Trashed some weapons that were redundant throughout the entire map.
-Second Awp room under the first Terrorist ramp.
-Reformation of all ramps in the map. The new ramps are perfectly scaled to the originals, but they are much smoother and cleaner to the eye.
-There were a lot of water brushes that were sticking out of the platforms, so I inset all the water within the platforms, making landings a bit trickier. Note: The Awp rooms under the first ramps are much harder to get too. Now that the water is inset within the floor, you cannot drop right into it.
-Changed a lot of the original water textures to up FPS and smoothness.
-Light_enviroment to match the original skybox and some minor lighting additions at "TOP."
-Finally, I added a bit of my own surf into the map. I just thought there could be a better way to "escape" from "TOP" when there are Awpers camping the top of Jail. The new surf is simple and effective and doesn't interfer with the original form/surf of the map.
-Cleaned up the spawns and added another post towards the front corner of the spawn, making it, not impossible, but much harder to spawn kill.

I'm sure I'm forgetting some minor touch ups or details that I did, but they are all implied.

Please feel free to leave me comments! This was a fun build, and I'm really happy with the final outcome.

**********
Minor fixes needed to be attented to, and after a discussion with many, I've decided to change the maps name to surf_greatriver_remix, as opposed to final which somewhat gives me credit for the build/design, which as I've come to realize, (thanks FAJ), is obviously not correct.

**********
Remix2
**********
This is the final version of this remake.  Optimization improvements were made to make the map flow even better then the original remix.  Aesthetic changes were made compared to the original remix due to the fact that, well it looked like shit.  The main change which, will be most obvious to all players and testers is the "added" surf.  The "added" surf now flows into the original surf that was in the concept design.  This makes for a better gameplay value of the "added" surf then the first remix.

Enjoy!
